ModMetaData.name: Edge of Descension - Monoblades
ModMetaData.author: Rabbit
ModMetaData.description:
Descent into madness, crave violence and avenge yourself from your past mistakes.
Slice opponents into bits of minced flesh with the monoblades provided in this mod. Superior than the monoswords in every aspects except damage, these blades are sharp with high penetration and slice fast, resulting in a lethal combination when used by a competent wielder.
